entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 p.m. NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.9Â°C

Observed at: Corner Brook 7:30 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling

Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
